title: Paychex's 1Q Revenue and Profit Climb
text:
By Allison Prang

Paychex Inc.'s (PAYX) first-quarter profit climbed, but at a slower pace than revenue as expenses increased.

The company's net income was $264.2 million, up 8.5% from the comparable quarter a year prior. Earnings were 73 cents a share, up from 67 cents a share.

Adjusted earnings for the first quarter were 71 cents a share, up from 67 cents a share.

Revenue was $992 million, up 15%. Analysts polled by FactSet were expecting $991.2 million.

Expenses were $642.9 million, up from $542.5 million, largely because of higher operating costs.

Write to Allison Prang at allison.prang@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 02, 2019 08:57 ET (12:57 GMT)
